name: Eiio-debian
body:
## clone

    git clone https://github.com/nagadomi/eiio-debian.git eiio-debian/eiio-debian

## update upstream source

    git-import-orig --pristine-tar ../../eiio/eiio-0.5.4.tar.gz

## marge branch

    git checkout ppa-saucy
    git merge master

## update changelog

    dch
    git add debian/changelog
    git commit

## build debian source package

    git-buildpackage -tc -S -sa --git-pristine-tar --git-ignore-branch

## upload to launchpad

    dput ppa-saucy ../eiio_0.5.4-1ppa1\~saucy_source.changes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
